entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries or rain showers beginning near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
